attributes.action: We need to start rationing now to protect people, resources and infrastructure
attributes.additional_details: Work with suppliers and business to enact controls on goods and make it fairer for people to get essentials. Focusing on the most vulnerable, but also evening out supply for everyone.
attributes.background: I believe that we should begin rationing to prevent hoarding and make sure that resources get to people who need it and is shared fairly. It will also protect people and businesses in the supply chain.
